pages.text: $(special)Absorption$() grants you $(important)bonus yellow hearts$() while holding the jeweled item!$(br2)These absorption hearts act as a shield, protecting your actual health.

pages.title: Primary Material
pages.text: $(FFFFFF)Nether Star$() grants $(special)Absorption +3$()$(br2)The power of a Wither, harnessed!

pages.title: Absorption Hearts
pages.text: $(li)Level 1: +2 absorption hearts$(li)Level 2: +4 absorption hearts$(li)Level 3: +6 absorption hearts (Nether Star)$(br2)Yellow hearts appear above your normal health bar and absorb damage first!

pages.text: $(li)Extra health buffer in fights$(li)Survive surprise attacks$(li)Boss fight survival$(li)PvP advantage$(li)Exploration safety$(br2)$(o)A shield fit for a champion!$()
